name: Teo The Stairway Corsair
description:
A fan-made game for twitch.tv/teosgame community.
Made by youtube.com/@rafalobrebski <--- Creation vlog & more info soon on the channel
! Music used in the game comes from https://www.epidemicsound.com/
One track (! also stream and youtube friendly !) comes from my brother's band ("Double Blind") https://open.spotify.com/artist/7cf6XA01WwJL3POyK0RldM
Controls: Arrows (or AWSD), spacebar for answering questions

Additional tips:

- Double-tap directional button (arrow or AWSD) for BOOSTED MOVE!
- Press and hold LEFT SHIT for speedboost movement
